featured.text: Once the questions are finished, the examiner analyzes the results to determine if the person tested 24 truthful.

definition.zh_def: 分析；對某事物進行詳細檢查以了解其結構或組成。
definition.en_def: To examine something in detail in order to understand its structure or components.
definition.example: The scientist will analyze the data to draw meaningful conclusions.
